mapper.select: SELECT ss.id, ss.`code`, ss.total_count, ss.custmer_name, ss.total_price, ss.sale_name, ss.sale_date, ss.remarks FROM t_sample_sale ss LEFT JOIN t_sample_sale_item ssi ON ssi.sample_sale_id = ss.id LEFT JOIN t_sample s ON ssi.sample_id = s.id LEFT JOIN t_sample_item si ON si.sample_id = s.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
